sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ifedioramma Chizoba bụ onye na-eme ka ụgbọala na-aga werewere n'ụzọ n'Awka, Anambra steeti gosiri ya bụ onyinye chukwu nyere ya ma kọkwaa ka o si eji ya bụ ọrụ eme ndị mmadụ obi aṅụrị.
Ọ sịkwa na ya bụ ihe ya na-eme bụ onyinye puruiche chukwu nyere ya.
Ihe i kwesịrị ịma maka iwu okporoụzọ
Etu ị ga-esi gbalarị kpachi kpachi okporoụzọ
'Agaghị m ụlọakwụkwọ were mụta etu e si arụ 'drone' - Agbo Samson
Ya bụ nwaamadị bi n'Awka, Anambra steeti sị na obi na-abụ ya sọ mma mgbe ụzọ dị ohere, ndị mmadụ na-aghọta ihe ya na-eme.
Kirie ya nke ọma ebe a.
